Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: You seem to be doing your job meekly and well for someone who complained so much.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: …What else did you expect after greeting me in such a violent manner?

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Heck, I was shocked hard. I find myself in the middle of nowhere, and the first person I meet blows off my limbs…

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: I was lost at first, but I get the gist of receiving guests now that I’ve tried it a few times.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Though I do still have a complaint…

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Complaint?

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Sheesh man, again with that stare. Can’t say a thing…

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: …Just tell me what you mean.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: I mean, well… It’s kinda tough to receive all the guests alone.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Guests arriving one by one I can deal with, but when a whole group enters, the first thing that comes to my mind is: “How the hell am I supposed to fight all of them…”

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: There’s gotta be a point where one person is no longer enough, right? It’s only working right now because all we’ve been facing were minor Syndicates and stuff.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: And the whole fuss about heightening emotions… You said I can’t just kill the guests right away because of that.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: …What’s that odd face hinting at.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: There is a way, technically speaking. Although I’m not certain if it’s for the best…

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: You’re gonna join in the fights yourself?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: No. There are entities that could be of help, however.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: And those “entities” are?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: The beings that used to wield tremendous strength and power, but are now too transient to maintain a physical form, hardly holding onto existence…

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: I don’t remember seeing any living being in this Library other than you and me.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: They’re asleep inside books where the perfect environment for them is simulated, along with librarians who will be of assistance to you.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Librarians? Entities inside books?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: That’s all you need to know about them for now. What matters more is that they can be useful for the Library’s growth.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Alright, let’s say that’s the case… How are those sleeping entities supposed to help us, exactly?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: You have to enter their books and free the librarians trapped within. I believe they’re under the influence of the Abnormalities’ powers for various reasons.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Since they’re highly unstable, they won’t easily trust us.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: You’re basically saying they’ll take us for invaders…

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Correct. If you can overcome all ordeals presented by them, they will come to accept you.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Instructions still unclear, ma’am… You said they’re as mighty as wet paper now. You sure they can give any help?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: We are not making the Abnormalities receive guests for us.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: If they can be understood and accepted, they will empower the librarians, directly or indirectly.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Still too ambiguous, I’ve gotta say…

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Anyhow, what you’re saying is that they’ll present us with ordeals, basically. And we have to overcome them to earn their recognition and borrow their powers.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Entering books… Sounds like something out of a fairy tale…

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: We’ll need their power to heighten the emotions of our guests to the peak, after all… I wish you success in there.

Dialog.Title: Servant
Dialog.Content: Sure sure, anything you say, ma’am…
